nodes.text: The Battle of Arantara was an engagement fought in 22 BBY on the astronomical object Arantara during the early Clone Wars between the Confederacy of Independent Systems and Galactic Republic. Jedi General Anakin Skywalker and Clone Captain CT-7567 "Rex," who became injured in the fighting, fought in the battle.

The battle for the astronomical object Arantara was fought during the early period of the galaxy-wide Clone Wars between the Confederacy of Independent Systems and Galactic Republic in 22 BBY. Clone Captain CT-7567 "Rex" and Jedi General Anakin Skywalker of the elite 501st Legion took part in the battle.

During the battle, Rex fought with merit and led his troops to the frontline without Skywalker, but he became wounded and was knocked unconscious. By the time Rex regained consciousness, his armor was damaged. Hidden behind cover in a rocky terrain, the Clone Captain awoke to Skywalker standing over him, as the Jedi General had come to rescue his captain and apologize that he had not led their soldiers into the fray; Skywalker told Rex that a real leader always led at the front.

The Battle of Arantara became one of the many battles Rex fought with excellence in. During the battle of the Expansion Region planet Mimban, Rex remembered Skywalker's lesson, using the example to fight battle droids alone while his clone troopers evacuated. After he was saved from B1-series units by Junior Representative Jar Jar Binks, Rex explained his philosophy, noting that a friend had given him the lesson.

The Battle of Arantara appeared in "501 Plus One," a comic story printed in Age of Republic Special 1, which was published on January 16, 2019. "501 Plus One" was written by Marc Guggenheim and illustrated by Caspar Wijngaard.
